text: “Mwadzidzidzi, mngelo adamuitana uku iye ataimilira akupemphera mchipinda cha m’kachisi: “Allah akukuuza nkhani yabwino (yakuti ubereka mwana; dzina lake) Yahya yemwe adzakhala wotsimikizira (mneneri yemwe adzabadwa) ndi liwu lochokera kwa Allah, (yemwe ndi mneneri Isa (Yesu) amene adzakhalanso wolemekezeka ndi wolungama ndi mneneri wa mwa anthu abwino.”
